description:
Welcome to my meet-up where I will introduced to the ay Foreign Exchange Markets and using my 32 years of experience explain how they work. In the this full day meet-up I will tell you: - How the Foreign Exchange Markets operate.

- What they are who uses the FX markets and why ?

- Which are the principle banks involved in the FX markets on a daily basis

- The shocking truth about the retail FX traders chances of success

- What type of brokers to use for your trading and more importantly which types of brokers should be avoided at all costs

- The right charts and time scales to use and the best currency pairs to trade

- Why you should only trade Forex only using price action techniques

- Which price action price patterns to use and in which market situations

- Why the majority of retail traders will lose money – guaranteed.

- Explain how supply/demand really works

- How to stay on the right side of the market
name: First European Forex Price Action Traders Meetup and Conference

description:
In this second meet-up I will continue my explanations of the Foreign Exchange Markets and explain how the principal banks make their market.

Join me as I show you how to detect the precise entry points, signals and price patterns where the banks turn the market. - How the banks make the $5 trillion a day Foreign Exchange Markets Work in their favour whilst banking huge profits. - Which of the big banks act as market makers, where and how they make their profits

- How the bank traders balance their books.

- The fallacy of the concept of the zero sum game

- How the Market Makers use Supply and demand to create profits for themselves and their shareholders

- How Price Action trading is used by the banks to trade

- The secrets of the 24 hour FX cycle works – that the big players do not want you to know

- Why the banks can get away with using the same old daily market maker inventory patterns day after day and taking money out of the market to make it look like child’s play.

- How to trade like a market maker yourself

- Why the current global FX investigations are not likely to change the fundamental issues in the market and where the authorities should be looking but aren’t !!

-Why ultimately nothing will change, the banks will continue to control the lions share of the FX market irrespective of any controls that put into place.

How you can trade like a bank using Price Avtion techniques
name: Second European Forex Price Action Traders Meetup and Conference
